nodes.text: Battle of the Valsedian asteroid belt
The battle of the Valsedian asteroid belt was a battle of the Galactic Civil War.
Sometime between 2 BBY and 4 ABY, the Galactic Empire decimated a Rebel base inside the Valsedian asteroid belt. The Imperial operation was led by Admiral Gaen Drommel.
As a reward for this success, Admiral Drommel would eventually be given command of the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Guardian.
